User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the PeteAi application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity, same as Firebase Auth UID.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

creationDate.description: Date and time the user account was created.

BlogPost.title: BlogPost
BlogPost.description: Represents a blog post generated or managed within the application.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this post. Foreign key to the User.

content.description: The main content of the blog post, usually in Markdown or plain text.

topic.description: The original topic the blog post was generated from.

creationDate.description: Server-side timestamp of when the blog post was created.

lastModified.description: Server-side timestamp of when the blog post was last modified.

collections.description: Stores blog posts owned by a specific user. The userId in the path MUST match the authenticated user's UID, ensuring path-based security. This structure also supports secure `list` operations based on `userId`.
